zh.title: 美元/加元技术分析：[短期震荡区间，观望为主]
zh.content:
当前美元/加元价格处于1.36681附近，短期内整体波动较小，市场呈现震荡整理态势。考虑到当前价格距离20日简单移动平均线(SMA)为1.36812相对较近，可能会在该价位附近产生短期的支撑。若价格突破此点位，可能会迎来进一步的上涨动力。

从技术指标来看，MACD的值为-0.00066571517，处于负值区域，表明短期内卖方仍占主导地位，但信号线数据缺失暂时无法进一步确认市场的趋势强度。RSI数据未提供，但一般情况下RSI位于50附近表示市场处于相对平衡状态，缺乏明确的买入或卖出信号。

支撑位在1.36672，接近当前价格水平，一旦跌破此支撑位，可能会进一步考验1.3650或更低的支撑区域。至于阻力位，1.36812是关键短期阻力位，突破此位置可能会迎来更大的上涨空间。

综上所述，目前市场缺乏明确趋势，建议交易者采取观望策略，等待价格突破关键支撑或阻力位后再做决策。

en.title: US Dollar vs Canadian Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
USD/CAD is trading at 1.36681, hovering just below the 20-period simple moving average at 1.36812, which suggests short-term downside pressure. The marginal 24-hour decline of -0.01% reflects consolidation rather than aggressive selling, yet price action remains capped beneath near-term dynamic resistance. The tight intraday range between 1.3672 and 1.36672 highlights compression, often a precursor to volatility expansion. Overall, the short-term bias leans mildly bearish while below the 1.3680 zone.

The negative MACD reading (-0.0006657) indicates fading bullish momentum and a slight shift toward bearish control. Although the signal line value is unavailable, the sub-zero MACD level implies that upside momentum has weakened. With RSI not provided, momentum confirmation is limited, but price positioning under the 20-SMA reinforces a cautious tone. If sellers maintain control below the moving average, downward momentum could gradually build.

Immediate support is seen near 1.3665, aligned closely with the session low of 1.36672. A sustained break below this level may expose 1.3640 as the next technical cushion, followed by 1.3600 as a broader psychological level. On the upside, resistance stands at 1.3680–1.3685, where the 20-SMA converges, and stronger resistance is located near 1.3720, a recent structural barrier.

From a trading perspective, short positions may be favored on rallies toward 1.3680 with tight risk management above 1.3720. Alternatively, a confirmed break below 1.3665 could offer momentum-based selling opportunities targeting 1.3640. Bulls would need a decisive close above 1.3685 to invalidate the immediate bearish bias and open room toward 1.3720. Patience is warranted until volatility expands beyond the current narrow range.
